p:
The WHO-China joint mission report reported that China’s vigorous public health measures to prevent the COVID-19 are the most “ambitious, agile, and aggressive disease containment effort in history.”
85 The drastic measures taken are listed in Table 4 . If not for a national strategy that incorporated all of these measures simultaneously, it was estimated there would have been 744,000 COVID-19 cases outside Wuhan on day 50 of the epidemic, compared with the actual number of fewer than 20,000.
86
